mapper.select: select h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.buildyear as builtYear, h.dongCode, h.dongName as dong, h.jibun as areaNumber, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, hd.dealAmount, hd.area, hd.dealYear, hd.dealMonth, hd.dealDay, hd.floor from houseinfo h left join sidocode si on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongcode,5) = left(gu.guguncode,5) left join housedeal hd on hd.aptcode = h.aptcode where dongName = #{dong} order by aptName;
